doc.previous: Daniel Beeckman made the next recorded visit chronicled in his 1718 book A Voyage to and from the Island of Borneo in the East Indies
doc.after: The first attempt at exploring the island was in 1857 by the crew of the Amethyst They tried to reach the summit of the island but found the cliffs impassable
